<div id='swfwrapper'/>
	<div id='message'/>
	<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript"> 
	  var ok = gadgets.flash.embedFlash('http://infobot-ndi09.blog-video.tv/tele_export.swf?id=e48cfa6cc7fdf7a7175d48133cb0db8a&couleur=#1693D8', 'swfwrapper');
	  if (~ok) {
		 document.getElementById('message').innerHTML='Error: Could not embed flash player!';
	  }

	</script>
